channel.title: Infrastructure on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Infrastructure on FinanClub

item.title: ET
item.description: score:110 Chances: Increasing global demand for liquefied natural gas is expected to benefit ET and other companies in the industry. Kyushu Electric Power is considering investing in the U.S. Lake Charles liquefied natural gas (LNG) project of Energy Transfer, indicating potential growth opportunities for ET.

item.title: CNM
item.description: score:15 Chances: Core & Main, Inc. has announced an upsizing of its secondary offering, indicating potential investor interest and confidence in the company. The company has seen significant stock growth, indicating positive market sentiment and potential for future gains. The acquisition of assets from a provider of water, wastewater, and storm drainage products signals a commitment to expansion and diversification of the companyâ€™s offerings.
